fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Mortician: You learn the role of the player who is executed by the Execution Event (Susceptible). 
- Gravestones: Learn 3 roles that arenâ€™t present in the game (Susceptible). [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Autopsy: Choose a dead player, and pick 3 players. Learned if any of them Killed the player at the end of the phase. [2 uses, 4 CD, Astral, Unique]
- Examinations: Choose two dead players. Learn if they win with one another. (True). [1 use, Unique, Astral, Unlocks D3]
- Memoriams: Gain a non-Special Item card of your choice. Gain a use for every 3 players you outlive. [1 use, 1 CD, Recharging, 0/3]
